/usr/bin/c++       CMakeFiles/ncurses_example.dir/src/ncurses_example.cpp.o  -o ncurses_example -rdynamic -L/usr/local/lib -L/home/nilxwam/workspace/gwam-simulator/builds -lboost_thread-mt /usr/local/lib/libboost_python.so -L/usr/local/lib -lgsl -lgslcblas -lm -lconfig -lconfig++ -lnative -lxenomai -lrtdm -lpython2.7 -lbarrett libconstants.a libsamlibs.a -lcurses -lform -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/home/nilxwam/workspace/gwam-simulator/builds
